Text.Page:
{@Rgn:45008$$Field Base Valiance} needs you even more than we do.

Unfortunately, you'll have to go through {@LinkCreature:45#3001#argonomorph Lokian archers} to even get close. Report to Lahiah if...I mean when...you get there.
Glad to see you, <PCCLASS:lcase>, but we're not the ones who need your help. Stick around and I'll fill you in.
